title: Part 120 - Application and Licensure
content:
Part 120 - Application and Licensure

State Regulations
§ 120.1 - General Application and License Authorizations and Requirements
§ 120.2 - Application for an Adult-Use Cannabis License
§ 120.3 - License Specific Tiers and Options
§ 120.4 - Fees
§ 120.5 - Filing of an Application
§ 120.6 - Processing of an Application
§ 120.7 - Application Eligibility and Evaluation
§ 120.8 - Application for Additional Licenses or License Type
§ 120.9 - Issuance of a License
§ 120.10 - License Duration
§ 120.11 - License Renewal
§ 120.12 - License Denial
§ 120.13 - Reapplication after License Denial
§ 120.14 - Voided Applications
§ 120.15 - Withdrawal of an Application
§ 120.16 - Standard for Reviewing Disqualifying Offenses
§ 120.17 - Notification and Reporting of Business Changes and Amendments for Applicants
§ 120.18 - Notification and Reporting of Business Changes and Amendments of Licensees
§ 120.19 - Licensed Premises for Cannabis Events
§ 120.20 - Opportunity to Cure
§ 120.21 - Severability

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
